title: 272: Combine Preview: Offense
itunes:title: 272: Combine Preview: Offense
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks recap the Marcus Peters trade (00:40) and Blake Bortles contract extension (10:56) before predicting the offseason quarterback carousel (16:17). The guys then dive into the combine and preview the offensive side of the ball (26:55). Which QB needs to have a big week in Indianapolis? Who will be MVP of the weekend? Find out on this edition of Move the Sticks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
